404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.message_html: We can't find the page you are looking for. Please try {{ search_link_text }} or viewing our {{ products_link_text }}.

contact_page.success_message: Thanks for getting in touch with us. We'll get back to you as soon as we can.

search.no_results_html: Check the spelling or use a different word or phrase.

form.checkbox_label: I want to send this as a gift

form.confirm: Confirm age and proceed to {{ shop }}
form.error: Shop access is limited to adults age {{ age }} and older.

comments.title: Comments
comments.comment_pending: Your comment has been submitted but needs to be approved by the store before posting.
comments.comment_success: Your comment bas been successfully posted! Refresh the page to see it.

quantity_error.title: Not available
quantity_error.message: You can only have {{ quantity }} {{ title }} in your cart.

shipping_calculator.prompt: Please enter your details to calculate shipping.

collection.empty_tag_filter: Try removing one of the filters above to get more results.

account.no_orders: You haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.message: To activate your account, choose a password and enter it below.

guest_checkout.message: Checkout as guest. No login required.

login.title: Log in
login.reset_password_message_before: We'll send you an email to reset your password.
login.reset_password_message_after: We've sent you an email containing a password reset link. If you remember your password before you receive our email, feel free to log in below:

new_customer.message: Sign up for an account to take advantage of order tracking and history as well as pre-filled forms during checkout on subsequent orders.

order.title: Order {{ order_number }}
order.billing_note: Note: all orders processed in {{ currency }}

reset_password.message: Enter a new password for {{ user }}:
reset_password.error: There was an error resetting your password, please try again.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

product.success_html: {{ product }} has been successfully added to your {{ cart_link }}. Feel free to {{ continue_link }} or {{ checkout_link }}.

slideshow.text_below: Introduce customers to your shop with lifestyle imagery and product photography.

featured_content.page_excerpt: Use this section to welcome customers to your store, say a bit about your brand, or share news and seasonal promotions.
